ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah. I m paying for 56k but can t get it bc of my phonelines. Rather than giving me a full phone line like everyone else in town has, they spliced mine with
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah. I'm paying for 56k but can't get it bc of my phonelines. Rather than
giving me a full phone line like everyone else in town has, they spliced
mine with all of the other lines in the area. Basically they just cut the
line and split it into little parts. The less bandwidth you have, the less
phones you can use. So if I pick up one phone while another is off the hook,
one of them won't work. and I am supposed to be able to have up to 4 phones
on the same line.
Drives me nuts!
luv,
-Su

That is terrible, I can't get DSL or Cable, but I am fortunate enough to
have 56k. I used to have 26k too when the game first came out and it seemed
to work ok.
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, April 06, 2002 7:52 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello


Oops. Typo. It's 1Gb of RAM. Sorry. I should proofread my own messages.
I need the RAM to compensate for a 26k dial-up connection. Can't even get
28k! I've ranted about this before. Still can't find my consumer rights
regarding my phone service so they are royally screwing me.
luv,
-Su

2GB of ram?!?! Isn't that a little excessive? Do you know if the 1.5 Ghz
Duron has been released yet? I always double everything when it is
availiable. I have a 750 Duron now and 512MB of ram. I guess I need to get
a
1.5Ghz Duron, 1GB or ram and what ever video card is relatively cheap
right
now, guess ill have to do some research on that. Maybe a 19" monitor too.
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, April 05, 2002 10:13 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello


I have the same video card and it runs great on mine. But it is a 64mb
one..
and I have an AMD 1.4Ghz processor and 2Gb of RAM..
luv,
-Su


What video card do you have? I have a Geforce 2 MX. When I first started
playing with the Luclin expansion, it ran like crap until I turned down
the
clip plane and then it ran great and all was well.
----- Original Message -----
From: justin
To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, April 04, 2002 5:06 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] hello


Hello everyone. I am finally happy I finally got to play
everquest
again. I had to reformat my hard drive and reinstall everything in
order
to
do it but the game now works and with the new video card i picked up the
graphics are awsome! Talk to you all soon.
